players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is dead. We need to analyze who voted how and what was said. No one is above suspicion."

You: "Bob makes a good point - a real detective would be more careful. Charlie is either lying or made a rookie mistake that will get them killed tonight."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and she is mafioso. Bob, I investigated Alice because Diana was random kill - no info gain. Vote Alice now."

Charlie was arrested
